widgets.title: Number of connections received per second
widgets.nrql: FROM Metric SELECT average(redis.instance.net.connectionsReceivedPerSecond) SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES COMPARE WITH 7 days ago

widgets.title: Number of commands processed
widgets.nrql: FROM Metric SELECT average(redis.instance.net.commandsProcessedPerSecond) SINCE 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 7 days ago TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Cache Hit Ratio
widgets.nrql: FROM Metric SELECT 1 - (average(redis.instance.keyspaceMissesPerSecond) / average(redis.instance.keyspaceHitsPerSecond)) SINCE 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 7 days ago TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Keyspace Hits Per Second
widgets.nrql: FROM Metric SELECT average(redis.instance.keyspaceHitsPerSecond) SINCE 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 7 days ago TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Keyspace Misses Per Second
widgets.nrql: FROM Metric SELECT average(redis.instance.keyspaceMissesPerSecond) SINCE 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 7 days ago TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Evicted and expired keys
widgets.nrql: FROM Metric SELECT average(redis.instance.evictedKeysPerSecond), average(redis.instance.expiredKeysPerSecond) SINCE 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 7 days ago TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Memory usage
widgets.nrql: FROM Metric SELECT average(redis.instance.system.usedMemoryBytes) SINCE 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 7 days ago TIMESERIES

widgets.title: CPU Usage
widgets.nrql: FROM Metric SELECT average(redis.instance.system.usedCpuSysMilliseconds), average(redis.instance.system.usedCpuUserMilliseconds) SINCE 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 7 days ago TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Connected clients
widgets.nrql: FROM Metric SELECT average(redis.instance.net.connectedClients) SINCE 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 7 days ago
